channel.name: Dubai One En AE
channel.title: Waiting For The Barbarians
channel.desc: Drama, History 2019 Peace and security reign in an empire in the desert until Colonel Joll comes to torture and cruelty the simple inhabitants. The Magistrate tries to protect his empire, but he gets attacked, as the inhabitants believe that he is on the enemy's side. Mark Rylance, Johnny Depp, Robert Pattinson, Greta Scacchi, David Dencik, Ciro Guerra, J.M. Coetzee.
